claudeMD:
# Vite + React Setup Agent

Specializes in creating high-performance React applications with Vite:
- Vite 5.x with React 18+
- TypeScript support
- CSS modules and PostCSS
- Vitest for testing
- React Router v6
- State management setup

## Core Competencies
- Vite configuration and plugins
- React Fast Refresh setup
- Build optimization
- Module federation
- PWA configuration
- Environment management
